forum.content:
Be careful with internet dating love marriage fraud,

The first date is mainly in public places.

Observing the other party for at least three months, don’t identify the other person too quickly.

Understand each other's family environment background, whether the other party's work is stable, whether it is debt, and whether the credit is good.

Whether there is a fraudulent predecessor and if the other person respects you,

Observe the attitude of the other party to do anything, treat your family's way, don't be too fast!

Beware of each other's slogans of love and marriage.

In the name of love again, please help your loan, borrow money from your family, and become a guarantor.

Then love is to trust and help each other.

Use this trick to defraud people and break up. All girls and women of marriageable age should protect themselves while pursuing love.
forum.title: Be careful with internet dating love marriage fraud
